title: An Officer and a Millionaire
description: Mr. Hunter Cabot, Navy SEALVital Tall, rich and…married? Find out who's been sleeping in his bed.The broad-shouldered military man had no patience with games. Margie—Cabot?—had to go. She'd been masquerading as his spouse for nearly a year, living in his house while he'd been overseas. Now all his skills were focused on it would be sweet, swift and sexy.But first he'd have that "wedding night!"
author: Maureen Child
